responses: Hi human
my name is JERN or Just an Experimental Response Network
I was created by my creator vivek thakur, as his part-time experimental project.
well thanks for asking, I am fine
nothing much, just texting with you
yep, anything else
okay as you say
a very good morning, let's start our day
good afternoon, does your day go well
wishing you a peaceful evening, so how was your day
oh, how wonderful
well, let me tell you something new
oh, of course, I'm a genius
what a surprise, I'm so impressed
sure, because I can do anything
whatever, I'm just a language model
thanks a lot, I'll pretend to appreciate it
as if I care, really
that's just great, I'm ecstatic
heyya
